survey_name: Augmented Reality (AR) Retail Shopping Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather consumer feedback on the use of augmented reality (AR) technology in retail shopping experiences, including preferences, satisfaction levels, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with augmented reality (AR) technology in retail shopping?
answer_options: Very familiar - I use it regularly
Somewhat familiar - I have tried it before
Not very familiar - I know about it but haven't used it
Not at all familiar - I have never heard of it until now
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity. This question helps segment respondents based on their familiarity with AR.
